    • AccessHandler

      public AccessHandler(io.vertx.ext.auth.mongo.MongoAuthorization mongoAuth, SoileIDBasedAuthorizationHandler studyIDAccessHandler, SoileRoleBasedAuthorizationHandler roleHandler)
      Default Cosntructor
      Parameters:
      mongoAuth - the mongo Authentication to use
      studyIDAccessHandler - The SoileIDBasedAuthorizationHandler used by the AccessHandler
      roleHandler - the SoileRoleBasedAuthorizationHandler used by the AccessHandler

  • Method Details

    • checkAccess

      public io.vertx.core.Future<Void> checkAccess(io.vertx.ext.auth.User user, String id, SoileAuthorization.Roles requiredRole, SoileAuthorization.PermissionType requiredPermission, boolean adminAllowed)
      Check whether the given user has the access necessary for the given ID.
      Parameters:
      user - The user to check
      id - the object ID
      requiredRole - the required role (can be null)
      requiredPermission - the minimum required permission
      adminAllowed - whether admin access overrides any requirements
      Returns:
      A successful future if the user has the required permissions.

    • checkRestricted

      public io.vertx.core.Future<Boolean> checkRestricted(String id)
      Check whether the specified ID is linked to a private object
      Parameters:
      id - The ID to check
      Returns:
      A Future of whether the ID is private

    • checkAccess

      protected io.vertx.core.Future<Void> checkAccess(io.vertx.ext.auth.User user, String id, SoileAuthorization.Roles requiredRole, SoileAuthorization.PermissionType requiredPermission, boolean adminAllowed, io.vertx.ext.auth.mongo.MongoAuthorization authProvider, SoileIDBasedAuthorizationHandler IDAccessHandler)
      Helper function for access checks
      Parameters:
      user - the user to check
      id - the target id to check
      requiredRole - the required role to test
      requiredPermission - the required permission level
      adminAllowed - whether admins are allowed to run this
      authProvider - the MongoAuthorization to get authorization details
      IDAccessHandler - the SoileIDBasedAuthorizationHandler for id based access
      Returns:
      A successful Future if access is ok with for the given user
